page.title: 04EDUCATION 2
page.content: { { Secondary education}is provided at {Sir John Talbot's},a co-educational comprehensive school.It caters for 850 pupils from 11 to 18 who have been educated in local primary schools.The{ {Lower School}in Ash Road houses Years 1-3.Subjects offered include English, Maths,French,German,Geography,History, Physical Science,Biology, Rural Science,Music,R.E. and Design.Skills of rugby,soccer,hockey,netball,tennis and athletics are also taught.Pupils transfer to the{Upper School} in Heath Road after the 3rd Year and follow a 2 year course leading to{C.S.E.,16 Plus {or O Level}qualifications.All pupils study English and Maths with six other subjects of their choice.An increasing number of pupils stay on in the 6th Form where a variety of courses are offered, mainly at{A Level. }
